emails.subject: Team Retreat Planning
emails.body:
Hello Team,

We are planning a retreat for the team next quarter. Please suggest dates and activities.

emails.subject: Re: Team Retreat Planning
emails.body:
Hi,

Prefer dates between July 10-15. Activities: hiking, workshops, and team-building games.

emails.subject: Re: Team Retreat Planning - Venue Options
emails.body: I've shortlisted two venues: Mountain Lodge Retreat and Lakeside Resort. Thoughts?

emails.subject: Re: Team Retreat Planning - Final Preferences
emails.body: Lakeside Resort is preferred due to better facilities and budget compatibility.
